name: Multiplayer VR Exergame
description:
Help science!

We are a group of university students from Aalborg University, Denmark, testing a game for our Bachelor's degree. We are mesuring people's enjoyment while playing a VR game online with another player! The game will make you exercise and has two game modes: competitive and collaborative!

Inspired by popular games

The game tests mechanics proven to be fun by popular games such as Beat Saber and Fruit Ninja! But these games lack the multiplayer aspect, which we are here to solve! Help us find out how to make the most enjoyable experience possible!

Features:
  • Multiplayer
  • Competitive / Collaborative game modes
  • Rhythm based gameplay
  • Interaction between players
  • Combos
  • Virtual Reality
  • Exercise while gaming
VR exclusive

This game was developed with Oculus Rift on PC. It has not been tested on Mac or with other VR headsets such as Vive or SteamVR. However, feel free to try on these platforms and report back to us how it went!

Provide feedback and support research

When you have played the game, please take a few minutes to answer this anonymous questionnaire. It will help us greatly, so we can find out how to make the most enjoyable online VR exergame as possible! Thanks a lot!
